column1: Smoque BBQ////I almost feel like I should leave them terrible review so they ain't so packed but given how good they get reviewed
column2: figure it's useless. I've been coming here since they opened and over the years
column3: they've expanded menu and streamed lined operations. while I never the original three dudes in the restaurant anymore
column4: they ribs and brisket quality has always been consistent. Â This is favorite ribs joint in the whole wide world.
